page.title: 13FARMING.
page.content: Approximately 75% of the area of our Domesday Survey is land belonging to the Cadland Estate. The principle farm is{Stanswood Farm.}This is occupied by {Mr. Steven Wright}who is the Estate Manger. His father and grandfather also lived at Stanswood Farm. On the estate there 55 dwellings. 12 men are employed on the farm most of whom have rent free dwellings. One is employed full time on building repairs, two on forestry and a student at the farm. There are three agricultural tenancies for life, these are :- {Mr. Bill Moris - Whitefield Farm}(pony grazing and farming). {Mr. Stan Betteridge - Ashlett House} (pony grazing).{ {Mr. Brian Tillman - Mopley Farm} (riding stable and trout fishery)
